Summary: An orange transparent glowing disc travelling silently in a NE direction, 2 witnesses.
divs: sighting detailsit was a crystal clear night on new years eve on the mid-north coast of new south wales. i wandered out side to relax on my front porch and admire the beauty of the stars. a few minutes later a slightly transparent glowing orange disc caught my attention. it took me a couple of seconds to realize what i was looking at was unnatural. the object moved smoothly and silently in a ne direction. i first observed the object when it was approx. 70 degrees above the horizon. although it had a straight line path and traveled at an approx. speed of 500km\h, i quickly ruled out a plane. it was a large disc, it had no visible external lights, it was silent. after a few seconds i ran and grabbed a camera, told my relative whom lives with me, then ran back outside to record the object. by this time it was still visible, unfortunately i failed to correctly operate the camera. however, my relative observed the object as it was gradually disappearing over the horizon. i was startled to say the least. i have researched all possibilities and so far remains unexplained. i am now a believer.
trends: There have been no other sightings in Kendall
This sighting has been favorited 1 time.
